name: development-website
description: Development website showcasing games and projects

scripts.build-shell: mkdir -p public/tetris public/ink-pen public/daily-tracking && cp index.html public/ && cd tetris && npm install && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../public/tetris/ && cd ../collaborative-canvas && npm install && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../public/ink-pen/ && cd ../daily-tracking && npm install && EXPORT=true npm run build && cp -r out/* ../public/daily-tracking/
scripts.build-local: mkdir -p public/tetris public/collaborative-canvas && cp index.html public/ && cd tetris && npm install && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../public/tetris/ && cd ../collaborative-canvas && npm install && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../public/collaborative-canvas/
scripts.dev:
echo 'Please specify which project to run:
  npm run dev:tetris    - Start Tetris game
  npm run dev:canvas    - Start Collaborative Canvas
  npm run dev:tracker   - Start Daily Tracker

Or navigate to the specific project directory and run npm run dev there.'
